title: Flight Simulator 2020 -  Addon spotlight - Douglas C 47D
description:
In this video, we'll explore the Douglas C-47D, which was released earlier this week. The aircraft, known for its varied roles during D-Day, including towing other aircraft, will be examined. After reviewing the liveries and failure modes, we'll position the aircraft at Southampton Airport to assess its exterior, interior, and cockpit. Finally, we'll guide you on where to find the manual, which is filled with fascinating details.

0:00 intro
0:10 aircraft basics and liveries
3:30 exterior review
6:52 interior review
8:11 cockpit review
13:53 where to find the manual
